structure.unit: Jurisdiction And Emblems Of The Commonwealth, The General Court, Statutes And Public Documents

law.text: [ Text of section effective until January 1, 2013. Repealed by 2012, 165, Sec. 6. See 2012, 165, Sec. 137.] In all newspapers designated to advertise such hearings, the advertisements shall be uniformly printed in type not larger than nonpareil, set solid, and without display either in the headings or in the body of the advertisements.
